scripts.disable-obfuscation: sudo mv dictionary.js dictionary_disabled.js; sudo mv obfuscationMapping.js obfuscationMapping_disabled.js;
scripts.enable-obfuscation: sudo mv dictionary_disabled.js dictionary.js; sudo mv obfuscationMapping_disabled.js obfuscationMapping.js;
scripts.manual-test: (yarn disable-obfuscation; yarn start; yarn enable-obfuscation;) || (npm run disable-obfuscation; npm run start; npm run enable-obfuscation;)
scripts.test: (yarn disable-obfuscation; mocha; yarn enable-obfuscation;) || (npm run disable-obfuscation; mocha; npm run enable-obfuscation;)
